attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the rising amount in bicycles on the roads which is a good thing reducing the carbon trail.  However due to the rise in crime and stolen bicycles, if they were all registered with the DVLA and a frame number embedded in the frame this would reduce the amount of stolen cycles and also make it easier for the Police to recongise cyclist who ride there bikes on the public highways disobeying the Highway code.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
